thread.title: NLC directs workers in Abuja councils to begin strike
thread.title_full: NLC directs workers in Abuja councils to begin strike

author: Agency Report
title: NLC directs workers in Abuja councils to begin strike
text: “Therefore, all workers in the six area councils in FCT are hereby directed without hesitation to proceed on an indefinite strike beginning from December 1, until further directives,” he said. ( NAN ) Support PREMIUM TIMES' journalism of integrity and credibility At Premium Times, we firmly believe in the importance of high-quality journalism.
